overview:
Mark Heflin is a Managing Partner at Endeavor Search Partners who brings over twelve years of experience in building his own high quality boutique search firm, Heflin & Associates, recruiting top executives and Board members for Venture Capital and Private Equity backed companies in the Technology and Consumer Sectors. He actively represents top Silicon Valley based venture capital investors including Norwest Venture Partners, Azure Capital and several others in recruiting material impact executives across all functional areas including General Management, strategic finance and other key areas. Prior to founding his own firm, Mr. Heflin worked in senior sales and executive management positions with companies including MAI Basic Four, Easel Corporation and AVID Technologies. AVID was funded by Greylock and grew from a start-up through an IPO to reach over $500M in sales and dominate the market.

Mark spent fourteen years growing up in Hawaii on Oahu and graduated from Punahou. He earned a Liberal Arts degree in Speech Communications from Drake University. His varied personal interests include surfing, golf, mountain biking, cycling and music. He loves technology and is a huge iPad fan and user!
